report.name: x_sstacheress_orbre

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select:
select distinct a.ilibel as LibProjet, a.Ligneimputation, a.LIBELLE_LIGNE_IMPUTATION, null as Lignedesaisie, null as Type_etape, null as Etape, a.LibellE_ETAPE, null as Tache, a.LIBELLE_TACHE, null as Sous_tache, null as type_Sous_tache, a.LibellE_sous_tAche, null as DPG_imputation, null as LibDir_imputation, a.NOM_RESSOURCE, a.Identifiant_de_ressource, a.DPG_RESSOURCE, a.SOCIETE, null as Metier, a.ConsommE_JANVIER, a.ConsommE_FEVRIER, a.ConsommE_MARS, a.ConsommE_AVRIL, a.ConsommE_MAI, a.ConsommE_JUIN, a.ConsommE_JUILLET, a.ConsommE_AOUT, a.ConsommE_septembre, a.ConsommE_OCTOBRE, a.ConsommE_NOVEMBRE, a.ConsommE_DECEMBRE, a.COUTHTR, a.COUTENV, null as Type_de_ressource, null as Code_prestation, null as Mode_contractuel_indicatif, a.StacheParamLocal, --NEW COLUMNS a.CLIENT, a.LIB_DPG_RESSOURCE , NVL(SUBSTR(a.LIB_CSM_LIGNE,1,INSTR(a.LIB_CSM_LIGNE||'/','/',1,4)-1),a.LIB_CSM_LIGNE) LIB_CSM_LIGNE, a.Code_IRT, --Application a.TYPE_DE_PLAN, a.ConsommE_Annuel, NVL(SUBSTR(a.LIB_DPG_RESSOURCE,1,INSTR(a.LIB_DPG_RESSOURCE||'/','/',1,3)-1),a.LIB_DPG_RESSOURCE) CDS_RESSOURCE, CASE WHEN (SUBSTR(TRIM(a.DPG_RESSOURCE),-1) = '7') THEN 'SG EBS' WHEN (SUBSTR(TRIM(a.DPG_RESSOURCE),-1) = '8') THEN 'Nearshore' WHEN (SUBSTR(TRIM(a.DPG_RESSOURCE),-1) = '9') THEN 'SG GSC' WHEN ((SUBSTR(TRIM(a.DPG_RESSOURCE),-1) BETWEEN 1 AND 6) AND (a.SOCIETE = 'SG..')) THEN 'SG PARIS' ELSE 'P2I Onshore' END Sourcing, NVL(SUBSTR(a.LIB_CSM_LIGNE,1,INSTR(a.LIB_CSM_LIGNE||'/','/',1,3)-1),a.LIB_CSM_LIGNE) CDS_LIGNE_BIP, NVL(SUBSTR(a.LIB_DPG_RESSOURCE,1,INSTR(a.LIB_DPG_RESSOURCE||'/','/',1,4)-1),a.LIB_CSM_LIGNE) CSM_RESSOURCE, (a.COUTHTR+a.COUTENV) as Cout_Total, nvl(A.COUNT_FT, (a.COUTHTR+a.COUTENV) ) COUNT_FT, a.ActivitE from ( select PI.ilibel as ilibel, ligne_bip.pid AS Ligneimputation, LIGNE_BIP.PNOM as LIBELLE_LIGNE_IMPUTATION, CONSO.libetape as LibellE_ETAPE, CONSO.LIBTACHE as LIBELLE_TACHE, CONSO.asnom as LibellE_sous_tAche, RESSOURCE.RNOM as NOM_RESSOURCE, CONSO.IDENT as Identifiant_de_ressource, CONSO.CODSG as DPG_RESSOURCE, CONSO.SOCCODE as SOCIETE, CONSO.JANVIER as ConsommE_JANVIER, CONSO.FEVRIER as ConsommE_FEVRIER, CONSO.MARS as ConsommE_MARS, CONSO.AVRIL as ConsommE_AVRIL, CONSO.MAI as ConsommE_MAI, CONSO.JUIN as ConsommE_JUIN, CONSO.JUILLET as ConsommE_JUILLET, CONSO.AOUT as ConsommE_AOUT, CONSO.septembre AS ConsommE_septembre, CONSO.OCTOBRE as ConsommE_OCTOBRE, CONSO.NOVEMBRE as ConsommE_NOVEMBRE, CONSO.DECEMBRE as ConsommE_DECEMBRE, TO_CHAR(PACK_UTILE_COUT.GETCOUTHTR(CONSO.SOCCODE, RESSOURCE.RTYPE,:P_ANNEE,LIGNE_BIP.METIER, CONSO.NIVEAU, CONSO.CODSG, CONSO.COUT, TO_CHAR(CONSO.CDEB,'DDMMYYYY'), STRUCT_INFO.FILCODE), 'FM9999999990D00') as COUTHTR,
PACK_UTILE_COUT.GET_COUT_FI_TOTAL(ligne_bip.pid,CONSO.ident,ligne_bip.codcamo,CONSO.cafi) AS COUNT_FT,
TO_CHAR(PACK_UTILE_COUT.GETCOUTENVHTR(CONSO.SOCCODE ,RESSOURCE.RTYPE ,:P_ANNEE,CONSO.CODSG ,LIGNE_BIP.METIER, TO_CHAR ( CONSO.cdeb , 'DDMMYYYY') ,struct_info.filcode), 'FM9999999990D00')as COUTENV, CONSO.PARAM_SSTACHE as StacheParamLocal, --NEW COLUMNS --CM.CLISIGLE CLIENT, cm.CLILIB CLIENT, STRUCT_INFO.LIBDSG LIB_DPG_RESSOURCE , (select LIBDSG from STRUCT_INFO where CODSG = CONSO.codsg) LIB_CSM_LIGNE, ap.acdareg ||'-' ||APG.alibel AS Code_IRT, --Application CASE WHEN ((l.type_proj = '1') or (l.type_proj = '2' and t.arctype in ('39','12','B02','B09'))) THEN 'CHANGE' WHEN (l.type_proj = '2' and t.arctype not in ('39','12','B02','B09')) THEN 'PLAN INTERNE' WHEN l.type_proj = '5' THEN 'STRUCTURE' ELSE 'RUN' END TYPE_DE_PLAN, --(select cusag from CONSOMME where pid = ligne_bip.pid and annee = (TO_CHAR(CONSO.cdeb,'YYYY'))) as ConsommE_Annuel, (CONSO.janvier+CONSO.fevrier+CONSO.mars+CONSO.avril+CONSO.mai+CONSO.juin+CONSO.juillet+CONSO.aout+CONSO.septembre+CONSO.octobre+CONSO.novembre+CONSO.decembre) as ConsommE_Annuel, CONSO.SOCCODE AS Sourcing, ligne_bip.LINEAXISBUSINESS1 AS ActivitE
FROM (SELECT DECODE(tache.aistty, 'FF', tache.aistpid, tache.pid) factpid ,tache.pid, nvl(libetapetache.libsstache,tache.asnom)asnom , tache.ecet , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 1, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) janvier , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 2, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) fevrier , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 3, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) mars , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 4, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) avril , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 5, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) mai , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 6, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) juin , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 7, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) juillet , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 8, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) aout , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 9, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) septembre , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 10, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) octobre , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 11, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) novembre , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 12, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) decembre ,situ_ress_full.ident ,situ_ress_full.codsg ,situ_ress_full.soccode ,situ_ress_full.niveau ,situ_ress_full.cout ,decode(libetapetache.libetape,'',libetapetachebips.etapelibel,libetapetache.libetape) libetape ,decode(libetapetache.libtache,'',libetapetachebips.tachelibel,libetapetache.libtache) libtache ,libetapetache.param_sstache --Fin KRA PPM 60727 --,si1.cafi -- , ress.RTYPE TYPE_RESSOURCE , situ_ress_full.PRESTATION CODE_PRESTATION ,si1.cafi , MAX(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb) cdeb FROM situ_ress_full , ligne_bip , tache , cons_sstache_res_mois , datdebex --KRA PPM 60727 , (select ie.pid, ie.ecet, ie.libetape, it.acta, it.libtache, iss.asnom libsstache, iss.acst ,iss.ADEB date_deb_ini, iss.AFIN date_fin_ini, iss.ANDE date_deb_rev, iss.ANFI date_fin_rev, iss.ASTA statut_sstache, iss.ADUR duree_sstache, iss.PARAM_LOCAL param_sstache from isac_etape ie, isac_tache it, isac_sous_tache iss where ie.etape=it.etape and ie.etape = iss.etape and it.tache = iss.tache ) libetapetache -- TD 712 ,(select lignebipcode, etapenum, etapelibel, tachenum, tachelibel, stachenum, stachelibel from BIPS_ACTIVITE bips ) libetapetachebips
-- annee courante ,STRUCT_INFO si1 , ressource ress
WHERE cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb >= datdebex.datdebex AND situ_ress_full.CODSG = si1.CODSG AND ress.IDENT = situ_ress_full.IDENT AND cons_sstache_res_mois.pid=tache.pid AND cons_sstache_res_mois.ecet=tache.ecet AND cons_sstache_res_mois.acta=tache.acta AND cons_sstache_res_mois.acst=tache.acst AND cons_sstache_res_mois.ident!=0 AND cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag!=0 AND DECODE(tache.aistty, 'FF', tache.aistpid, tache.pid)=ligne_bip.pid AND cons_sstache_res_mois.ident=situ_ress_full.ident AND (cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb>=situ_ress_full.datsitu OR situ_ress_full.datsitu IS NULL) AND (cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb<=situ_ress_full.datdep OR situ_ress_full.datdep IS NULL) AND ( situ_ress_full.prestation not in ('GRA', 'MO', 'IFO', 'INT', 'STA') or situ_ress_full.prestation is null) and tache.pid = libetapetache.pid(+) and tache.ecet = libetapetache.ecet(+) and tache.acta = libetapetache.acta(+) and tache.acst = libetapetache.acst(+) and tache.pid = libetapetachebips.lignebipcode(+) and tache.ecet = libetapetachebips.etapenum(+) and tache.acta = libetapetachebips.tachenum(+) and tache.acst = libetapetachebips.stachenum(+)
GROUP BY tache.pid ,DECODE(tache.aistty, 'FF', tache.aistpid, tache.pid) ,tache.asnom , tache.ecet , tache.acta , tache.acst ,tache.aist ,tache.tacheaxemetier ,situ_ress_full.ident,situ_ress_full.codsg,situ_ress_full.soccode, situ_ress_full.niveau, situ_ress_full.cout ,libetapetache.libetape -- TD 712 ,libetapetache.libtache -- TD 712 ,libetapetache.libsstache ,libetapetachebips.etapelibel ,libetapetachebips.tachelibel ,libetapetachebips.stachelibel ,si1.cafi , ress.RTYPE , situ_ress_full.PRESTATION , situ_ress_full.MODE_CONTRACTUEL_INDICATIF --KRA PPM 60727 ,libetapetache.date_deb_ini ,libetapetache.date_fin_ini ,libetapetache.date_deb_rev ,libetapetache.date_fin_rev ,libetapetache.statut_sstache ,LIBETAPETACHE.DUREE_SSTACHE ,libetapetache.param_sstache) CONSO, ligne_bip, proj_info PI, etape, directions, APPLICATION AP, APPLICATION APG, RESSOURCE, STRUCT_INFO, CLIENT_MO CM, vue_dpg_perime VDP, type_activite t, lien_types_proj_act l WHERE CONSO.ecet = etape.ecet AND CONSO.pid = etape.pid AND ligne_bip.pid =CONSO.factpid AND PI.icpi=ligne_bip.icpi AND ligne_bip.codsg=struct_info.codsg AND INSTR(:P_PERIM_ME, VDP.codbddpg) > 0 AND struct_info.coddir=directions.coddir AND CONSO.ident =ressource.ident AND ligne_bip.CLICODE =CM.CLICODE AND ligne_bip.airt = AP.airt AND AP.ACDAREG = APG.AIRT AND (CONSO.codsg =VDP.codsg OR ligne_bip.codsg = VDP.codsg) and trim(ligne_bip.TYPPROJ) = trim(l.type_proj) AND ligne_bip.ARCTYPE = t.arctype AND l.type_act = t.arctype AND t.actif ='O' &P_WHERE ) a ORDER BY a.Identifiant_de_ressource,a.Ligneimputation;

function.name: afterpform
afterreport
